hero.title: Hi!
hero.description: Hello! I'm Atakan, a developer with a strong passion for technology and software development. My expertise lies in mobile app and web development. I'm constantly driven to learn new technologies and improve my projects.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: If you have any questions, project proposals or collaboration suggestions, feel free to reach out. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

form.title: Send Quick Message
form.subtitle: Fill out the form to get in touch with me directly
form.name: Name
form.successMessage: Thank you for your message. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

footer.description: Everything on this site is protected by the MIT license.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.subtitle: I'm a lifelong learner and my technology stack grows every day

position.title: Current position
position.description: Currently not working on any project

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: A personal about page built with React.js and Tailwind CSS to showcase my skills and projects.

about.title: Personal About Page
about.description: A personal about page built with React.js and Tailwind CSS to showcase my skills and projects.

weather.title: Weather App
weather.description: A simple weather app using OpenWeatherMap API. Allows users to view weather information based on city and location.

todo.title: Todo List App
todo.description: A simple and user-friendly todo list application. Allows users to add and manage tasks.

developingProjects.title: In Development
developingProjects.description: Projects I'm currently working on. Click/tap the cards for more information.

chatApp.title: Real-Time Chat Application
chatApp.description: A chat application that enables users to message in real-time. Being developed using WebSocket technology, you can follow the progress by contacting me or following updates here.

blogApp.title: Personal Blog Application
blogApp.description: A blog application that allows users to create and share blog posts. Being developed with a user-friendly interface and rich text editing features, you can follow the progress by contacting me or following updates here.
